In my eyes, Bond is a very professional university that really looks after its students. Rather than being a number, lecturers and tutors genuinely care about their students and ensuring they are achieving to the best of their ability. Description: The September semester for this program will be delivered in a multi-modal format, with classes designed to support and engage all learners.
